The basket is a nice, heavy duty woven wicker, with a sturdy loop wicker handle and brass latch/hardware.  The basket is in very good shape.   Not sure of the exact age of this kit, but guessing it is from the late 90's.   The interior is lined with cotton with a simple reddish stripe pattern.   This basket includes a set of four white plastic plates, 4 low-ball glass glasses and metal flatware with white plastic handles. This set is in great condition!  (Note - the color of the wicker is lighter than it looks in these pictures.  I think the sun and contrast is making it look darker).  
Perfect for a family picnic or camping trip!

Shipping Notes: I am committed to offering the lowest shipping costs to you. 
1. My shipping estimate is based on Parcel Post (takes about a week to arrive), and DOES include tracking. Shipping costs vary based on zip codes, so I am conservative in my estimate.  
2. If I have over-estimated the shipping, I send a same-day postage refund back through Paypal, rounded up to the nearest dollar. 
3. If you want extra services or quicker delivery, just let me know and I can give you an updated shipping estimate.
4. I will definitely combine shipping for multiple purchases and refund all excess shipping charges. 
5. I’m happy to ship outside the US. Just convo me for an estimate.

Product name: TEACHER SALE Personalized Female Teacher Rubber Stamp, Custom Teacher Stamp, Personalized Teacher Gift - Choose Hairstyle and Accessories
Description:
Pink Pueblo's personalized Female Teacher rubber stamp is a thoughtful appreciation or end of the year gift for your teachers! You get to choose the name, hairstyle and accessories for your teacher to make the stamp as personalized as possible. The stamp art is original art by Devon (that's me!) at the studio of Pink Pueblo. All stamps are hand made and hand packaged in my studio prior to shipment.
• Size: approximately 1.875x1.875"
• one wood mounted photopolymer stamp
• designed and hand made in the United States
ABOUT OUR STAMPS
Pink Pueblo custom stamps are high quality wood mounted photopolymer stamps. Our hand made stamps are permanently mounted on maple wood mounts. Please note each stamp is a custom creation and may vary slightly in size or text layout (due to length or size of text).
ABOUT OUR INK
We are proud to offer ColorBox® Premium Dye Ink by ClearSnap®. Inkpads are not automatically included with your stamp purchase; if you want to include an inkpad please select your color above. ColorBox® Premium Dye Ink is fast-drying ink that is washable with water, and dries well on glossy or coated papers. Inkpad dimensions: L 4" x W 2.5" x D .5".
HOW TO ORDER
• Please enter the text to be included on the stamp in the Message to Seller section exactly as you want the text to appear on the completed stamp. 
• Please also enter the Hairstyle of choice and Accessories of choice (see preview images) in the Message to Seller section (for example: 'straight, short with bangs and round glasses').
You'll receive a convoed digital proof of your stamp within 24 hours of purchase. Inkpads are not automatically included with your stamp purchase; if you want to include a inkpad please select your color and ink type above.
TURNAROUND TIME
Unless previously discussed, your stamp will ship 1-3 business days after proof approval via the United States Post Office. You will receive a shipping notification as soon as your package is on it's way! If you need faster shipping, please contact me. Please note stamps orders will not be cancelled or refunded after proof approval. We always offer Free Economy Shipping for our United States customers!
CARING FOR YOUR STAMP
Stored and cared for properly, your stamp will last for years. Photopolymer is prone to staining, so gently wipe your stamp with a damp cloth after use. Don't ever submerge your stamp in water, and ensure your stamp is thoroughly dry after cleaning. Store your stamp indoors and away from direct sunlight to prevent yellowing. If your stamp does stain, don't panic - this won't affect it's performance! Don't use solvent or oil-based inks, and never use harsh cleaning chemicals on your stamp.
COMMERCIAL USE
Pink Pueblo stamps may be used to decorate products or packaging for your business. However, our artwork may not be used as your logo or duplicated.
ALSO ON ETSY
Please visit our digital shop at 
pinkpueblo.etsy.com
 for personal and commercial use clipart, graphics and photography tools! 
© Pink Pueblo. All rights reserved.
International Buyers – Please Note:
Import duties, taxes, and charges are NOT included in the item price or shipping cost. These charges are the buyer's responsibility. Please check with your country's customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to purchasing.

Product name: Ready to ship Muslin kids Teepee tent/ Kids Play tent /  Tipi Wigwam or Playhouse with poles and Door Ties/
Description:
Designer talk:
▂▂▂▂▂▂▂▂▂▂▂▂▂▂▂▂▂▂▂▂
Simplicity is beauty. This is the nature unbleached muslin teepee.
Only two material was used for this teepee, 100% cotton and 100% solid wood. No fire retardant, no chemical treated fabric.
********************************
What is the different of Muslin teepee and canvas teepee?
Muslin is 4oz 100% cotton fabric and breathable.
Canvas is 10oz weight 100% cotton and durable.
Which teepee should I choose for my kids?
If you want to paint on the teepee, please choose the canvas version.
Other than this, I think muslin is enough for indoor use.
*********************************

This handmade kids tent teepee, play tent, indoor tent, wigwam, kids fort or whatever you want to call it is sure to entertain. The teepee can be used outdoor as a play tent, or indoor as a reading corner, or wherever and however you chose to use it! This teepee style is cute enough to give a decoration touch to any room. Product name: Guitar Strap - Personalized Leather Guitar Strap in the Smokey Pattern in Antique Black - for Acoustic or Electric Guitars
Description:
When I started working with leather 12 years ago, one of the very first patterns I made I called the "Smokey" pattern. It included a hand-written, custom inscription.  I was the first one to do it, and the method I use, writing every inscription entirely by hand, gives my work a rustic, handmade, and very special look.  The inscription on this guitar strap can be anything you can imagine - song lyrics, wedding vows, a letter, or scripture.  What will yours say? 
To make this piece I start with a vegetable tanned tooling leather leather then cut, brand and dye it by hand before applying a protective coat to keep it safe from the elements. The antique black dye will vary from piece to piece because leather is a natural material so some may be darker or lighter than the image shown.
TO CUSTOMIZE THIS PIECE: Just add it to your cart and put the inscription as you would like it to appear on the strap in the "NOTES TO SELLER" section when you check out. No need for a custom listing! You can include up to 1100 characters including spaces and punctuation.
COLOR: This strap is "antique black" as shown in the picture. It's a black wash applied over the tan of the leather that allows some of it to show through, giving it a blackish brown look. Since leather is a natural material, some variation is to be expected.
STRAP OPTIONS: See the last photo for the two layouts. All straps are 2.5" wide
Option 1 (top): Symmetrical strap, adjustable at both ends. Can be used with banjo, guitar, bass, or dobro. Adjusts from 45-58"
Option 2 (bottom): Tapered at one end. This strap works best for guitars. Adjusts from 38" to 52". 
PLEASE SPECIFY which option you'd like when ordering. All orders not specified will be made as Option 2. Both come with a leather tie to attach it to the head of the instrument if you don't have two strap pins. 
HOW LONG DOES IT TAKE? I do my best to keep my current turn-around time listed in the main page of my shop. If you need something sooner, please send me a convo with the item(s), shipping location, and date needed and I will let you know if it is possible. 
Want to see more of my work? Check out my other shops:
www.etsy.com/shop/moxieandoliver
www.etsy.com/shop/makerandlamb

Anything from rock and roll to scripture, wedding vows, love poems... whatever you want to tell that special someone, or remind yourself, while playing.
I start with a tooling leather leather then brand, paint, and dye it, and then apply a protective coat to keep it safe from the elements.

COLOR: This strap is "antique black" as shown in the picture.  It is a black wash that is applied over the tan of the leather allowing some to show through.  The end result is a cool brown or warm black look.  It can vary from piece to piece since leather is a natural material and may be darker or lighter than the image shown.  If you would like something that is more of a true brown, please look in my shop for the "Smokey Strap in Antique Brown" instead since it is a more reliably light color. 
STRAP OPTIONS: See the last photo for the two layouts.  Both are 2.5" Wide

Option 2 (bottom): Tapered at one end. This strap works best for guitars. Adjusts from 38" to 52". 
PLEASE SPECIFY which option you'd like when ordering. All orders not specified will be made as Option 1. Both come with a leather tie to attach it to the head of the instrument if you don't have two strap pins. 
HOW LONG DOES IT TAKE? I do my best to keep my current turn-around time listed in the main page of my shop. If you need something sooner, please send me a convo with the item(s), shipping location, and date needed and I will let you know if it is possible.

Product name: Antique Platinum .60 carat Diamond Wedding Set
Description:
This is a gorgeous vintage wedding set done in platinum.  The diamond center diamond that is very clean VS and GH color.  It is a really nice diamond.  There are four side diamonds that make the total carat weight approximately .50 carats.   The matching wedding band holds 5 diamonds that total approximately .10 carats.
All the diamonds are eye clean and the ring very sparkly.   It is 16mm across and 6.5mm wide in front with both the band and engagement ring.      The finger size is 4.25 and it can be sized up.  The set weighs in at a hefty 5.1 grams.    They are both stamped 100 irid 900 plat which is the proper mark.
This is a gorgeous wedding set, it feels of quality.    The diamonds are firey and the design is beautiful.   This is a beautiful vintage wedding set, beautiful in every way.
